Recommendations: The resume is **longer than 1 page**, Consider condensing the information to fit within a single page for better readability and impact.  Prioritize the most relevant and recent experiences and skills to showcase your expertise effectively.

While the resume includes a summary, consider **revising it** to be more concise and focused on your key achievements and career goals.  A strong summary should immediately grab the reader's attention and highlight your value proposition.

The resume includes both hard and soft skills, consider to add more skills as per the job description to improve your resume to be shortlisted.**Tailor your skills section** to match the specific requirements of the jobs you are applying for, showcasing the most relevant skills upfront.

Consider to add the projects that you have done to showcase your expertise, even if you have small projects try to add that. **Including projects** demonstrates your practical application of skills and provides tangible examples of your capabilities.

The resume includes a list of certifications, consider adding more certifications that are more related to your domain to improve the **expertise in the field**. Adding more certifications demonstrates your commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

Ensure **consistent formatting throughout the resume** to maintain a professional and polished appearance. Pay attention to font styles, spacing, and alignment to create a visually appealing and easy-to-read document.

While contact details are provided, ensure they are accurate and up-to-date. Also consider adding a **LinkedIn profile URL** to enhance your professional presence and allow recruiters to easily access your online profile.
